thread.title: Saudi women in the driving seat at last

title: Saudi women in the driving seat at last
text:
Saudi women in the driving seat at last Wednesday, March 07, 2018 - 02:11 
Thousands of women are signing up to driving schools across Saudi Arabia as the driving ban is lifted in the conservative kingdom, Reuters Emily Wither spoke to women attending one of the first driving schools to open its doors in Jeddah. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Thousands of women are signing up to driving schools across Saudi Arabia as the driving ban is lifted in the conservative kingdom, Reuters Emily Wither spoke to women attending one of the first driving schools to open its doors in Jeddah.
